channel.title: Sandra Schönberger on Sandra Schönberger
channel.description: Recent content in Sandra Schönberger on Sandra Schönberger

item.title: Von Aubergine bis Zucker
item.description: A dictionary about German words with Arabic roots. This group project was developed during the 2nd semester. Every student picked a word and created an illustration and a poetical text for this word. I picked the word “Safran”. Since we were not able to meet in person because of the pandemic, we chose the kitchen lithography for our illustrations.

item.title: FAST-Test
item.description: Conception, Illustration and designing of the app “FAST-Test”, which is meant to help stroke patients and relatives. This project was a group project of a fellow student and me. In order to build a functional and working prototype, we spent a lot of time on the conception, which included personas, user stories and user journeys. We also talked to a neurologist about our app. The design is built very simple to guarantee a fast use without difficulty in case of emergency.

item.title: Das Reis(e)korn
Planquadrat
item.description: Documentation and exhibition of a photography workshop in my 4th semester in cooperation with street photographer Margret Hoppe. During the 4th semester I got the opportunity to participate in a photography workshhop. The main goal was to show the beauty and diversity of the city of Münchberg. Every student was assigned a grid square of Münchberg randomly. We spent the whole day taking photos in these grid squares. Subsequently, all photography series were talked about and compiled.

item.title: Glaubenssache
item.description: Our main focus during the 4th semester was to work with the city of Münchberg and the people living there. As a part of this project, I created a city map on the subject of the diversity of religion in Münchberg. I mainly worked with photography and illustration. To show the variety of beliefs, I added interviews with inhabitants of Münchberg. I especialliy wanted to include personal stories and experiences to make my project more relatable and understandable.

item.title: Datenschutz
item.description: Im Folgenden möchten wir Sie aufklären, wie Ihre Daten von uns verarbeitet werden. Verantwortlich im Sinne der DSGVO ist: Sandra Schönberger Ludwigstr. 27 95213 Münchberg Sollten Sie per E-Mail mit uns Kontakt aufnehmen, werden die mitgeteilten Daten von uns gespeichert, um Ihr Anliegen zu bearbeiten. Wir werden die Daten löschen, sobald die Speicherung nicht mehr erforderlich ist oder die Verarbeitung einschränken, falls gesetzliche Aufbewahrungspflichten bestehen. Betroffenenrechte Sie haben als betroffene Person, das Recht auf Auskunft, das Recht auf Berichtigung oder Löschung, das Recht auf Einschränkung der Verarbeitung und das Recht auf Widerspruch gegen die Verarbeitung Ihrer Daten.

item.title: Impressum
item.description: Angaben gemäß § 5 TMG Sandra Schönberger Ludwigstr. 27 95213 Münchberg Kontakt Telefon: +49 15732638571 E-Mail: hello@sandraschoenberger.de Quelle: Recht24

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello again, my name is Sandra and I’m in the 4th semester of studying communication design at Hof University. I’m 19 years old and originally from a small town near Landshut. In 2020 I finished my A levels and started to study right away. I’ve always loved to be creative and to help people out, therefore communication design was my first choice. And I’m still very happy with my decision. My main emphasis can be found in the sectors of editorial-design, graphic design, social design and photography.
